                                          java.lang.String[] cols,

        Convert array date to SQL command.
        Parameters:
        data - (String[]) Origin data array.
        cols - (String[]) SQL columns array.
        map - (Map<String, String>) Map for value transform.
        Returns:
        (String[]) 4 part of SQL commend [INSERT column(), INSERT VALUES(), UPDATE SET value, UPDATE WHERE rule value]
